actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 95-921.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Second Liberty Bond Act to allow the interest rates paid on U.S. retirement plan and individual retirement bonds to be increased to the rate paid on U.S. series E savings bonds.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 95-921) Amends the Second Liberty Bond Act by authorizing the Secretary of the Treasury to make upward adjustments in the interest rate on outstanding retirement bonds, so that the investment yield of such bonds will be consistent with the investment yield then established for Series E U.S. savings bonds.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Second Liberty Bond Act to allow the interest rates paid on U.S. retirement plan and individual retirement bonds to be increased to the rate paid on U.S. series E savings bonds.
